sense.name: destroy, spoil, make useless
sense.examples: The son has made such a mess of things that he has ruined the family franchise. The raisin has ruined the oatmeal cookie. It has ruined the whole ebay expeirence for me and thousands like me! Sorry if I ruined the ending for you. In previous years we finished quickly but made minor mistakes that ruined our chances.

sense.name: deflower, deprive of virginity
sense.commentary: archaic usage (this sense reflects an entry in WordNet and other sources, and not the opinions of VSAP!)
sense.examples: This dirty old man ruined several young girls in the village.
